keyword: calories in a double double protein style
title: Calories in a Double Double Protein Style
meta_description: Discover calories in a double double protein style from In-N-Out, including protein, fat, carbs, full nutrition breakdown, and easy tweaks for your order.
h1: Calories in a Double Double Protein Style
assumptions: In-N-Out Burger standard: two beef patties, two cheese slices, lettuce wrap (no bun), tomato, onion; no spread unless noted.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, customizations, patty size, and cheese type. Check In-N-Out app or receipt for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A Double Double Protein Style burger has 330 calories and 37g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: What is a Double Double Protein Style?
faqs.a: It's an In-N-Out burger with two beef patties, two cheese slices, wrapped in lettuce instead of a bun for lower carbs.

faqs.q: How many calories in a Double Double Protein Style without spread?
faqs.a: About 330 calories; adding spread increases it by around 90 calories.

faqs.q: What's the protein content in a Double Double Protein Style?
faqs.a: Approximately 37g of protein from the beef patties and cheese.

faqs.q: Does Protein Style have fewer carbs than the regular bun version?
faqs.a: Yes, only 4g carbs vs. about 39g in the bun version, making it keto-friendly.

faqs.q: How does sodium compare in a Double Double Protein Style?
faqs.a: Around 1080mg sodium, mostly from cheese, patties, and veggies; varies with customizations.
